meanings.definition: a person who is studying at a school or college
meanings.sent1: The student raised their hand to answer the teacher's question.
meanings.sent2: Every student in the class was excited for the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent3: The student tried to study while balancing a pencil on their nose.
meanings.sent4: She was a student of life, always eager to learn new things.
meanings.sent5: The young student's enthusiasm for learning was contagious.

meanings.sent1: The new employee was a student of the company's procedures.
meanings.sent2: As a student of history, he enjoyed exploring ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The student of cooking burnt the toast for the third time that morning.
meanings.sent4: She approached each challenge as a student, ready to absorb new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Being a student of nature, he marveled at the beauty of the changing seasons.
